quick-start-about-1: Welcome to Peer Chat! Here, you can connect with anyone, anywhere in the world, through the internet.
quick-start-about-2: Simply click the Create button below to set up your own room. Invite your friends or meet someone new. If your friends already have a room, join them by clicking the Connect button.
quick-start-about-3: You can also join public rooms listed below and start engaging with others right away. The choice is yours!
room-list-no-public-rooms: No public rooms are currently available.
room-info-hint: The room is full. Wait until someone leaves to join.
invite-form-hint-id: Share the room ID with your friend.
room-error: Oops! It seems this room has been deleted. Please choose another room to continue.
room-wait-peer: Waiting for a peer to connect...
room-wait-room: The room is full. Please wait until a spot opens up.
